languages.text: {n}Вечно напряженный и готовый к исполнению долга Соломон почти похож на обычного человека без своей брони. На привычных к насилию ладонях не вспухают угрожающие костяшки, линия рта расслаблена, взгляд блуждает в блаженном полузабытьи.{/n}

{n}Eternally tense and ready for duty, Solomorne almost looks like a normal man without his armour. For once, his knuckles are not menacingly taut on his violent hands, the line of his mouth is soft, and his gaze wanders in drowsy blissfulness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вечно напряженный и готовый к исполнению долга Соломон почти похож на обычного человека без своей брони. На привычных к насилию ладонях не вспухают угрожающие костяшки, линия рта расслаблена, взгляд блуждает в блаженном полузабытьи.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eternally tense and ready for duty, Solomorne almost looks like a normal man without his armour. For once, his knuckles are not menacingly taut on his violent hands, the line of his mouth is soft, and his gaze wanders in drowsy blissfulness.{/n}

{n}Eternally tense and ready for duty, Solomorne almost looks like a normal man without his armour. For once, his knuckles are not menacingly taut on his violent hands, the line of his mouth is soft, and his gaze wanders in drowsy blissfulness.{/n}

{n}Eternally tense and ready for duty, Solomorne almost looks like a normal man without his armour. For once, his knuckles are not menacingly taut on his violent hands, the line of his mouth is soft, and his gaze wanders in drowsy blissfulness.{/n}

{n}Eternally tense and ready for duty, Solomorne almost looks like a normal man without his armour. For once, his knuckles are not menacingly taut on his violent hands, the line of his mouth is soft, and his gaze wanders in drowsy blissfulness.{/n}

{n}Eternally tense and ready for duty, Solomorne almost looks like a normal man without his armour. For once, his knuckles are not menacingly taut on his violent hands, the line of his mouth is soft, and his gaze wanders in drowsy blissfulness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ohne seine Rüstung sieht der sonst stets angespannte und pflichtbewusste Solomorne fast wie ein normaler Mann aus. Seine groben Hände sind nicht angespannt, sein Mund wirkt beinahe sanft und in seinen Augen liegt ein Hauch von Glückseligkeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Eternally tense and ready for duty, Solomorne almost looks like a normal man without his armour. For once, his knuckles are not menacingly taut on his violent hands, the line of his mouth is soft, and his gaze wanders in drowsy blissfulness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ohne seine Rüstung sieht der sonst stets angespannte und pflichtbewusste Solomorne fast wie ein normaler Mann aus. Seine groben Hände sind nicht angespannt, sein Mund wirkt beinahe sanft und in seinen Augen liegt ein Hauch von Glückseligkeit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Éternellement tendu et prêt à accomplir son devoir, Solomorne ressemble presque à un homme ordinaire sans son armure. Pour une fois, ses phalanges ne sont pas crispées de manière menaçante sur ses mains violentes, ses lèvres sont détendues et son regard s'égare dans une béatitude somnolente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Eternally tense and ready for duty, Solomorne almost looks like a normal man without his armour. For once, his knuckles are not menacingly taut on his violent hands, the line of his mouth is soft, and his gaze wanders in drowsy blissfulness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Éternellement tendu et prêt à accomplir son devoir, Solomorne ressemble presque à un homme ordinaire sans son armure. Pour une fois, ses phalanges ne sont pas crispées de manière menaçante sur ses mains violentes, ses lèvres sont détendues et son regard s'égare dans une béatitude somnolente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}常に緊張して任務に備えているソロモーンだが、装甲を脱いだ今は、まるで普通の男のように見える。珍しく、その荒々しい手の拳は威圧的にこわばっておらず、口元の線も穏やかで、視線はうっとりとしたまどろみの中をさまよっていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Eternally tense and ready for duty, Solomorne almost looks like a normal man without his armour. For once, his knuckles are not menacingly taut on his violent hands, the line of his mouth is soft, and his gaze wanders in drowsy blissfulness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}常に緊張して任務に備えているソロモーンだが、装甲を脱いだ今は、まるで普通の男のように見える。珍しく、その荒々しい手の拳は威圧的にこわばっておらず、口元の線も穏やかで、視線はうっとりとしたまどろみの中をさまよっていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Siempre tenso y listo para el deber, Solomorne casi parece un hombre normal sin su armadura. Por una vez, no tiene tensos los nudillos, su boca no está apretada y su mirada recorre somnolienta la habitación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Eternally tense and ready for duty, Solomorne almost looks like a normal man without his armour. For once, his knuckles are not menacingly taut on his violent hands, the line of his mouth is soft, and his gaze wanders in drowsy blissfulness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Siempre tenso y listo para el deber, Solomorne casi parece un hombre normal sin su armadura. Por una vez, no tiene tensos los nudillos, su boca no está apretada y su mirada recorre somnolienta la habitación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管平时的索罗蒙永远保持着紧绷状态，随时准备执行任务，但当他脱下盔甲之后，几乎与普通人没有任何区别。此时此刻，他硕大的手上并没有紧紧地套着铁甲，嘴角也变得柔和，目光在昏昏欲睡的至福边缘徘徊。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Eternally tense and ready for duty, Solomorne almost looks like a normal man without his armour. For once, his knuckles are not menacingly taut on his violent hands, the line of his mouth is soft, and his gaze wanders in drowsy blissfulness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管平时的索罗蒙永远保持着紧绷状态，随时准备执行任务，但当他脱下盔甲之后，几乎与普通人没有任何区别。此时此刻，他硕大的手上并没有紧紧地套着铁甲，嘴角也变得柔和，目光在昏昏欲睡的至福边缘徘徊。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Her daim gergin ve göreve hazır olan Solomorne, zırhı yokken sıradan bir insana benziyor. Bu kez nice vahşet görmüş ellerinin eklemlerini tehditkârca germiyor, dudakları yumuşamış ve huzurlu gözlerinden tatlı tatlı uyku akıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Eternally tense and ready for duty, Solomorne almost looks like a normal man without his armour. For once, his knuckles are not menacingly taut on his violent hands, the line of his mouth is soft, and his gaze wanders in drowsy blissfulness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Her dem gergin ve göreve hazır Solomorne, zırhı yokken herhangi bir adam gibi aslında. Bu defa nice vahşet görmüş ellerinin eklemlerini tehditkârca germiyor, dudakları yumuşamış ve huzurlu gözlerinden tatlı tatlı uyku akıyor.{/n}
